title: Fan Mount Fragment, late 18th century
medium: carved and pierced mother-of-pearl sticks with gold and silver foil, rivethead of faceted stone, silk ribbon
description: Mount for pleated fan. Mother-of-pearl pierced and carved with central cartouches supported by an all-over design of c-scrolls on a ground of blue diaper design. Details overlaid with gold and silver foil. Guards carved with figures of mermaid, within irregular frame formed of c-scrolls. Rivethead of colorless, faceted stone. Pink connecting ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph: Fan Mount Fragment, late 18th century; carved and pierced mother-of-pearl sticks with gold and silver foil, rivethead of faceted stone, silk ribbon; Gift of Anonymous Donor; 1952-161-215
